meaningMnemonic: ゴミ means "garbage." Add a <kanji>box</kanji> to it and you have a garbage box aka a <vocabulary>garbage can</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>garbage bin</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading is just the kun'yomi reading, the one you learned with the kanji. Be sure to pay attention to the rendaku though. はこ changes to ばこ.
